alert.note: Alert for Northwest Beaverhead County; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 13 at 7:36AM MST until January 14 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero. * WHERE...Northwest Beaverhead County and Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The period of coldest, and most extreme, wind chills are expected through this morning.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Northwest Beaverhead County; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains
